pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Thursday, November 19, 2020 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

9:55 a.m. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks at the APEC CEO Dialogues and participate in a live Q&A.

Media are required to register for the event via the following link: www.apecceodialogues2020.com/media.

12:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will make an announcement with Minister of Environment and Climate Change Jonathan Wilkinson, Minister of Canadian Heritage Steven Guilbeault, and Minister of Infrastructure and Communities Catherine McKenna. A media availability will follow.

Ornamental Gardens
75 National Capital Commission Scenic Driveway

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 11:45 a.m.
  • Media wishing to cover the event must be accredited with the Parliamentary Press Gallery.
  • Journalists can dial in to listen and ask questions.
  • Participant dial-in numbers:
    Local: 613-954-9003
    Toll-free: 1-866-206-0153
    Pass code: 6822783#

3:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with Opposition leaders and participate in a COVID-19 briefing with Chief Public Health Officer of Canada Dr. Theresa Tam and Deputy Chief Public Health Officer of Canada Dr. Howard Njoo.

Closed to media.
